com.foreach.across.modules.graphql.entity.configuration

Class GraphQLSchemaConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.graphql.entity.configuration.GraphQLSchemaConfiguration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntitiesGraphQLSchemaConfiguration

    public class GraphQLSchemaConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration published when creating the GraphQLSchema. Allows configuring the GraphQLSchema.Builder or post processing the entire schema.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    EntitiesGraphQLSchemaConfiguration

        public GraphQLSchemaConfiguration configureSchema(@NonNull

        Customize the schema that should be generated.

      • translateSchema

        public GraphQLSchemaConfiguration translateSchema(@NonNull
                                                  @NonNull UnaryOperator<graphql.schema.GraphQLSchema> postProcessor)
        Translate the generated GraphQLSchema. The value returned by the function represents the final schema that should be used (as GraphQLSchema is immutable it must be replaced).
        Parameters:
        postProcessor - to modify or replace the generated schema
        Returns:
        current configuration
